r.s: This package provides access to logical bitstreams packaged within an ogg file.
r.d: This package provides access to various media types inside an Ogg bitsream. Currently only metadata retrieval from Vorbis audio is available.
r.n: There have been a few API changes since the last release, so if your system depends on this package, please ensure it isn't left broken. The license has now been changed to LGPL.
